meta.name: Pokeguide
meta.about:
若你的生活總離不開 地鐵，那麼POKEGUIDE便是你必備的電話應用程式。作為一個一站式服務平台，我們不但為用戶提供最快捷直達地鐵出口的方法，還有大量消 閒飲食好去處以及消費優惠，讓用家能有效節省最多的時間。

POKEGUIDE is now an essential mobile application for all the passengers of MTR. As an all-in-one destination guide serving Hong Kong people to ultimate efficiency, we manage to provide the fastest way for our users to reach their desired MTR exits. Upon each MTR station, leisure activities, appealing cuisine and shop discounts and benefits that you are able to reach nearby are recommended. You can now save most of your time from not just travelling, but also sorting out the best plans and deals of your day in just one app!
